channel.title: Rachel Ross on Veggie Guide
channel.description: Recent content in Rachel Ross on Veggie Guide

item.title: Have a Happy Carnage-Free Easter
item.description: It’s now been several weeks since ‘Carnage’ debuted on BBC iPlayer and, so far, the reaction has been overwhelmingly positive. Both non-vegans and vegans have been flocking online to their blogs and twitter pages to sing its praises. laughing and crying at #carnage at the same time. hilarious, beautiful and eye-opening. time to entirely rethink my diet. @SimonAmstell — dill funk (@qscats) March 26, 2017 Please watch Simon Amstell’s “Carnage”.
